response.overview: By popular demand, here at last is the 4th volume of the Festival SPASM horror DVDs. It is by far the most BLOODY, the funniest, and above all the most TERRIFYING of the series.  This time, alongside Quebec horror films, you’ll also find French and Belgian films. Among the 12 horror short films included on the DVD, you’ll see a guy trapped in Cabine of the Dead, die-hard hunters in Quebecers vs Zombies 2, a terrified babysitter in Red Balloon, a haunted movie theater in Saturation, and the return of your favorite killer — the BAGMAN!
response.title: SPASM Horreur Volume 4
